about_the_game:
Fish your way across lush Gaia in this retro 2D pixel-art fishing RPG. Enjoy a relaxing day or battle for your fishing life against monsters of the deep. With 12 selectable characters, varying difficulty, numerous equipment options, and surprises, you’ll be hooked on this buried treasure of a game!

Follow the characters from the upcoming epic RPG, Last Dream II, in their quest to become Master Fishers. Help them win the Gaia Championship!

Key Features:


  • 5 adjustable difficulties + an unlockable challenge mode!
  • 12 characters each with unique fishing attributes and overdrives
  • 100 unique fish from Guppies to Monsters of the Deep
  • 14 unlockable locations where rare fish lurk, each with unique music
  • Compete in Fishing Tournaments to prove your skill!
  • Upgrade your fishing equipment to catch bigger fish!
  • Trawl the seafloor to collect Treasures, Pearls, & Messages in Bottles
  • Buy new items and accessories from the Traveling Merchant
  • Unlock New Game+ with the chance to earn over 80 Fishing Arcade Achievements!
  • Crush your fishing foes in Reborn Mode!



Thoughtfully Crafted Mechanics: Last Dream Fishing Arcade embraces the concept “easy to learn, hard to master.” Anyone can enjoy an afternoon of fishing fun, yet only the utmost skill and persistence can challenge the God of Fishers himself, Glaucus! Catch fish through casting, reeling, unleashing powerful overdrives at the perfect moment, and securing your hook through directional multipliers. Enhance your fishing abilities through accessories and wisely-timed items. Multiple difficulty settings allow you to customize the game to suit your style – be it hardcore angler or laid-back trawler.



Unlockable Mysteries: The Last Dream Fishing Arcade includes 100 unique fish, all of which are a mystery when you commence your journey. Start with the Jack-of-all-Trades fisher, Lucius – the Gray Mage, and unlock new characters by catching strange new fish. Begin your fishing adventure on the sunny shores of Ceos and unlock new locations by collecting messages in bottles to discover the locations of rare fish!



Compelling Replayability from the Creators of Last Dream: With 5 adjustable difficulties, 12 unique characters, over 80 achievements, and an unlockable challenge mode, the Last Dream Fishing Arcade will keep you coming back! The game isn’t over once you win the Gaia Championship – continue your journey to become the new God of Fishers through New Game+ mode or start a new game with all of your fishing equipment, items, and accessories in Reborn mode to enjoy a more relaxing fishing experience. Just. One. More. Fish!

About Our Developers:


Our development team is comprised of people who deeply cherish the RPGs of our childhoods.

We began developing Last Dream to be the central element of our decades-running annual RPG Tournament among fellow physics graduates. We started with the sole desire to craft an enduring game that we would personally enjoy. We continue to develop Last Dream II to combine the best aspects of the classic and modern games that we love so much.

Fishing has always been a big part of the Last Dream RPG series, which is even more true for Last Dream 2 – each fish you catch will directly benefit your journey. The Last Dream Fishing Arcade uses many of the same mechanics and is centered entirely around exploring the oceans of Gaia as you master every tournament and tame every creature. The characters and mechanics in the Last Dream Fishing Arcade comprise a vibrant, exciting microcosm that is part of the upcoming Last Dream 2 universe yet also wholly capable of standing on its own two (sea) legs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 Series or Similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 12.6 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Apple Silicon or Intel Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 Series or Similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Last Dream Fishing Arcade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 Series or Similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
